lore: At present, dryads carry a sprout from the tree that gave them life. In this way, they can travel to distant lands, and even plant the sprout to replace their oak if it were to perish.\n\nWhen a Dryad Warden finds someone lighting a fire where they should not, she uses her power to absorb the heat of the flames and holds it over her hand. With a homicidal look in her eyes, she throws the fire at the offender to burn them alive.
menagerieDialog: More and more forests are destroyed each year; your kind should be more careful.
I will show the world what it means to disrespect nature.
I wish you'd build a garden in our kingdom so I can feel a bit more at home.
I sometimes miss the forest. Can we return there for a visit one day?
I believe this kingdom could use a few more trees and plants to liven things up a bit. What do you think?
name: Dryad Warden
